Trương Đình Tú – Full Stack Engineer · Resume.io
https://resume.io/r/fbIvkEplL 1/1
TRƯƠNG ĐÌNH TÚ
Full Stack Engineer
0834190594
PROFILE
A�er graduated, i've worked as a Full Stack developer at FSo� for 3 years. Familiar with .NET &
front-end, SQL server. Have knowledge with common web architecture & principles.
EMPLOYMENT HISTORY
.NET Developer at FPT So�ware, Hồ Chí Minh
August 2016 – August 2019
Working on DMS (Distributor Management System) projects, reuse the framework of team to
implement functions, develop functions only.
Using ASP .NET to build Web APIs.
Autofac for dependency injection.
ORM: Entity framework with code first, generate model with T4Template, some module
use Dapper.
Logging with log4net.
Transfer XML files using WinSCP via FTP, implement windows service jobs to sync data.
Front-end: use ExtJS to create page, AJAX to call API.
Design & implement report use Telerik reporrt.
Using .NET Core to build backend framework based on build-in .NET Core APIs include OAuth,
DI...
Both authenticate with JWT & authorize user permissions based on build-in middleware.
Logging with Serilog to log system errors, otherwise return semantic validation
exceptions via middleware.
Implement import/export excel with dynamic template.
Front-end: using Angular 6 for UI. Build & optimize custom common components such as
GridView, Autocomplete... able to customize DOM with Client javascript, CSS, design
semantic layout.
Familiar with SQL Server, can optimize & analyze query.
Coding mobile app use Flutter for sales with some functions such as  synchronizing data, scan
bar code. Maintain Xamarin android application.
Achieved FSOFT Quality Honor of quater 2018: key member take part in building framework
help development more quickly.
EDUCATION
University Of Science, Hồ Chí Minh
December 2013 – December 2016
Degree: Good
EXTRA-CURRICULAR ACTIVITIES
Blood donation & company volunteer activities at FPT So�ware, Hồ Chí
Minh
August 2016 – August 2019
DETAILS

English
HOBBIES

technology, traveling, listen to
music, swimming and do gym
excercises...
